name: Happy Bones
description:
After receiving a message from her father who has been missing
for the last 4 years, Laura heads out to a house located inside
a cult compound to search for her parents, and the truth.

Unfortunately what she finds will lead her on an epic adventure
across infernal hells, haunted locales, and the macabre!

Things are not as they seem in this Horror RPG!



KEY FEATURES

- Challenging Gameplay!
- Unique Hand Drawn Art Style!
- Animated Attacks & Cutscenes!
- 3 Distinct Classes!
- Side Quests & Secrets!
- Original Sound Track!
- PostGame!
